career_labels.label: European Parliament
career_labels.involvement: Elected member and held various roles including Rapporteur in the Committee on Foreign Affairs, Human Rights, Common Security and Defence Policy.
career_labels.reasoning: Long-term affiliation as an elected member with significant committee involvement.

career_labels.label: Swedish Riksdag
career_labels.involvement: Elected member of the Swedish Parliament, also served as Minister for International Development Cooperation.
career_labels.reasoning: Long-term elected position and ministerial role in national governance.

career_labels.label: Moderate Party
career_labels.involvement: Held leadership roles including deputy chairman, vice chairman, and first deputy chairperson.
career_labels.reasoning: Long-term leadership roles in a major political party.

career_labels.label: United Nations
career_labels.involvement: Held various roles including minister, member of high-level panels, and Deputy Executive Director of UNAIDS.
career_labels.reasoning: Significant involvement in multiple high-level UN roles and initiatives.

career_labels.label: World Bank
career_labels.involvement: Member of the High Level Advisory Council on Women's Economic Empowerment and Gender Advisory Council.
career_labels.reasoning: Long-term involvement in advisory roles related to gender and economic empowerment.

career_labels.label: Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance
career_labels.involvement: Member and Vice-Chair of the board, involved in global health initiatives.
career_labels.reasoning: Significant leadership and board roles in a major global health organization.

career_labels.label: Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation
career_labels.involvement: Member of the Advisory Group and Advisory Board in Europe.
career_labels.reasoning: Advisory roles in a major global philanthropic organization.

career_labels.label: Africa Europe Foundation
career_labels.involvement: Member of the Board and Co-Chair of the Strategy Group on Health.
career_labels.reasoning: Leadership roles in fostering Africa-Europe relations and health strategies.

career_labels.label: European Council on Foreign Relations
career_labels.involvement: Member of the Board of Governors and Board Member.
career_labels.reasoning: Long-term involvement in shaping European foreign policy and relations.
